name: No Pain No Gain (Finlay)
description:
Be the dentist for the day.

Take satisfaction in causing pain and suffering to patients and get paid for it.

 

You can play the game with a keyboard and mouse or with a gamepad

 

Mouse and Keyboard:

  • Tooth Selection - Left Click / WASD / Arrows
  • Tool Selection - Right Click to get the tool wheel or use 2 - 6
  • Patient Record - Middle mouse / Tab
  • Interact - Space / Enter / Z
  • Mini Game Movement - WASD / Arrows
  • Stop Working on Tooth - Esc / P

Gamepad:

  • Tooth Selection - Left Stick / Dpad
  • Tool Selection - RB / RT / Right Shoulder / Right Trigger
  • Patient Record - LB / LT / Left Shoulder / Left Trigger / Select
  • Interact - Buttons West / South
  • Mini Game Movement - Left Stick / Dpad
  • Stop Working on Tooth - Buttons North / East

The game was developed over 8 days for the Jamoween 3 - Children of the Jam, which was organised by the Indie Game Squad. The theme of the jam was 'Your Worst Fears and Nightmares'.
